title: Film workshop
creator_credit: J B Parsons and Associates and J Parsons
brief_description: This film shows the production of two short films by third-year boys at Cornwell Secondary Modern School, East Hampshire. At this school a complete four year syllabus was devised so thet every boy received at least an hour’s screen education each week.
